exceptions.tactic: intros A eq_dec f g l a H1 H2 H3.

original: intros A eq_dec f g l a H1 H2 H3. induction l as [|x xs IH]. - left. reflexivity. - simpl in *. destruct (eq_dec a x) as [Heq | Hneq]. + right. destruct (H2 x) as [Hin _]. apply Hin. left. reflexivity. discriminate. + apply IH; intros; try auto. * apply H1. right. auto. * apply H2. right. auto.
